title: Computers as communicators: designing a multimedia interface that facilitates cultural understanding among sixth graders
proctitle: CHI '91: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Amanda Ropa
authors.institution: Interdisciplinary Computer Science, Mills College, Oakland, California

references.text: Tufte, E. Visual design of the user interface. I B M Corp., New York, N,Y., 1989.
Heckel, P. The elements of friendly software design. Warner Books, New York, N.Y., 1984.
Apple Computer. Human interface design: Ten general principles. Apple Computer, San Francisco, CA, 1988.
Taylor, R. (Ed.) The computer in the school: tutor, tool, tutee. Teacher's College Press, New York, N.Y., 1980.
Freisen, J. People, culture and learning. Detselig Enterprises, Calgary, B.C., 1977.
